tool_description: Modifies existing flight bookings including passenger changes, flight changes, date modifications, and handles associated fees and restrictions.

modification_type.description: Type of change: passenger_change, flight_change, date_change, cancel_booking

new_flight_id.description: New flight identifier for flight changes

new_departure_date.description: New departure date for date changes (YYYY-MM-DD)

passenger_modifications.description: Array of passenger changes in format: OldName>NewName or +NewPassenger or -RemovePassenger

error_messages: Booking not found: The provided booking_reference does not exist.
Invalid modification type: Use one of [passenger_change, flight_change, date_change, cancel_booking].
Modification not allowed: This booking cannot be modified due to fare restrictions or timing.
New flight unavailable: The requested new flight is not available.
Invalid passenger format: Use 'OldName>NewName', '+NewName', or '-RemoveName' format.
Change fees apply: Additional fees required for this modification.
usage: Provide booking_reference and modification_type, then specify relevant parameters based on change type. Include waiver_code if you have a fee waiver.

modification_status.description: Change result: success, failed, or requires_payment

new_booking_reference.description: Updated booking confirmation number if changed

fare_difference.description: Fare difference for flight or date changes (positive or negative)

updated_details.description: Summary of changes made to the booking
